channel.title: Any recommended money making methods for me?
channel.description:
Well I've been at ~23m net worth for a while, and I'm hoping to increase it without relying on Dragon Pickaxe drops like I used to. Here are my stats (ignore the fact its basically an achievement pic. Its the most recent pic of my stats): [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/4081/90237787.png[/img]
Does anyone know any good money making methods that would work out well for me? Like I said, I don't necessarily want to rely on rare drops, but I still want to make a fairly steady income. I also don't want to PK/stake or anything of the sort. I already know how to merch, so don't bother mentioning that :P Thanks in advance.

item.title: Any recommended money making methods for me?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Stupit:

Slayer, honestly. I was like ‘omfg ppl y u slay’ until I got into it, and now I’m fucking making cash like a madman.

Slayer for me was never really good money? Then again i’ve only done like 4 tasks on kuradel.
Dks, amazing money. You need to find a good team, or get a team filleeeed with ‘noobs’ (sometimes i do the noob teams as I want to help my friend get gps). You can solo of course but you probably don’t know how to. It depends on how efficiant you and your team are and how many people there are, I used to make 3m an hour roughly doing it so I wouldn’t be surprised if you made 1.5m an hr+ profit.
Farming drags etc, just generally finding a market niche where the demand is good and the supply is low is what you should look for.
Hunt graahks, chins, grenwalls etc.
So many ways, you just need to find one that suits what type of player you are though as remember having fun is key;3.

Read full topic
item.source: Any recommended money making methods for me?

item.title: Any recommended money making methods for me?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:20, topic:425796”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=528459.msg3855554#msg3855554 date=1324333060]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=528459.msg3855537#msg3855537 date=1324332642]

Well right now you could get some stats up and make some profit, call me crazy but right now you make a killing fletching. Also any monster that drops herbs is a good investment since bots no longer flood those.
[/quote]I forgot herbs were going up so high Now I think of it, so are runes. Maybe I’ll RC a little even

I had 30k fires runes in my bank.
That went from a 120k value to over 1m.
[/quote]What are they at right now? I haven’t checked in a while.[/quote]

Oh my bad they’re only 23 each, so around 700k. But all the other runes skyrocketted too.

Read full topic
